mainText:
As a child, dreamed of having an Apple product, products, beautiful and easy to use, who created the great genius Steve Jobs, 
today I have an iPhone, iPad among other Apple products that were created by the brilliant mind of Steve Jobs.
Today we lost a brilliant a mind, the more I'm sure now he is with God our Lord and Savior, he is now in the arms of the Father.

May God be with Steve Jobs

Hugs from a big fan and user of great products that you created.
author: Edu
